wikipedia_page.main: Stephen Williams (born 6 June 1996) is a Welsh professional cyclist, who currently rides for UCI WorldTeam Team Bahrain Victorious. He joined the team as a stagiaire in August 2018, becoming a full member of the team in 2019. In October 2020, he was named in the startlist for the 2020 Vuelta a España.
